website_summaries.verdict: A great addition to the Minecraft fan's weapon collection. This toy is particularly exciting because it functions both as a toy sword and pickaxe.
pros: Serves double-duty as a sword and a pickaxe for active play
cons: Material is hard plastic (not spongy like some other Minecraft swords)

customer_reviews.title: Hardy as heck but basically a blunt weapon
customer_reviews.text: This thing is hardy as heck. I bought it for my son for his birthday because he loves Minecraft and asked for this toy specifically (thanks Youtube), in June. It still transforms and doesn't have so much as a scuff on it after several months of really rough play. (My kids are hard on toys) The only thing I'd caution parents about is that it is a very hard plastic and while there are no sharp edges it's essentially a blunt weapon. So really think about what child you are giving it to because it could do some serious damage if swung to hit someone or something. The mechanism for transformation is really clever and quite amused my boy.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney SimondsTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe they would even ship that out it’s extremely damaged. I’m going to have a very disappointed son on Christmas
customer_reviews.author: lisa foote

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We love this sword/pick ax combo so much more than the foam versions. It may be a little tough for some smaller children to change between the two weapons but my three yo was able to get it after a couple tries. We have been giving this as birthday gifts since both my boys loved it so much. It is primarily a hard plastic with foam teeth when the weapon transitions to the sword if I remember correctly.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable!
customer_reviews.text: My son has had this for 7 straight days and it is not broke. That's a flipping miracle - this is a rare toy of quality in the sea of asian crap.
customer_reviews.author: Gris

customer_reviews.title: Tough as (plastic) diamonds
customer_reviews.text: I jokingly got this for my goddaughter, saying I was gonna outdo her dad for her birthday. Had NO IDEA she'd agree. This thing honestly seems like its gonna stand up quite some time against the tough play style of two 8 year olds and a 6 year old. Matched with a Minecraft themed Uno game and an Enderman plushie - and maybe just A COUPLE handmade party decorations - this was a real hit!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lynn

customer_reviews.title: My son said "I'd buy it again!"
customer_reviews.text: Two for one.. I mean.. why not? It's got some quality build and has survived a Halloween and the roughing up from a five year old since. Most Minecraft gear is so expensive I figured it was a cardboard cutout or something. It's actually a quality item! I'm with my boy on this one! It's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Fozzie

customer_reviews.title: Well made, kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: 6yo bought this with his piggy bank money. He saw it in a youtube video and fell in love. He has carried it around nonstop for a month and half and the 3yo has even gotten his hands on it and its still in great working order! They are pretty rough on their toys, too...Great toy! Genius transforming action!
customer_reviews.author: Tarapotamus

customer_reviews.title: Epic
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! My son begged for the sword and the ax every other day. He could never decide which one he wanted, and I didn't have to make him choose. I got so many brownie points for the "2 toys in 1". Even better, I didn't spend an arm and a leg getting both. Have you seen those crazy prices for a minecraft sword?! It's been months, and it is still a favorite of his and is holding up excellently to his abuse 😆 super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Happy Minecraft lover
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this transforming pickaxe/sword. It is very sturdy and transforms smoothly. It is a nice solid toy. I’m not sure it is worth the $25 price tag, but I guess that is the price one pays for a Minecraft branded toy. You would only want to give this to an older, more responsible child, who won’t be whacking things around the house with it because it is made of solid, hard plastic. It is brightly colored and looks like the product photos. It is a good size for my 7 year old. Overall we are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft Transforming PickAxe
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool, sturdy, dare I say nearly indestructible toy. My 10 year old is always whacking us with it and she uses it to turn on/off her red stone ore cube light which, when used on it, makes the original mining sound (sound is mechanical, not electronic). It transforms by simply pulling the handle. It's a hoot!
customer_reviews.author: karma

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a decently made ax. It is a Minecraft ax that is used in the game It doesn't really do anything but if your child loves Minecraft they will appreciate this ax. My kids just use it to poke at each other so maybe not a great idea if each child doesn't have one, not saying it so they can battle it out, as it's used to build, but also to get rid of bad guys.. It's ok, nothing great
customer_reviews.author: Denise Murray

customer_reviews.title: Cool but Expensive
customer_reviews.text: My Minecraft infatuated son wanted this for his birthday. It's cool because it transforms. For the price, it'd be cooler if it had lights and sound, too. Sort of expensive for what it is. But, if you have a Minecraft fanatic at your house, it will be loved.
customer_reviews.author: Laura_Mamato2

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was thrilled to use this for her Halloween costume, and then for playing at home. It’s super neat how it transforms from the sword to the axe. And it’s not a bad price at all, compared to other flimsier items, that don’t even transform. So 2 for the price of 1!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sword! We have had it for a couple months now. Love how it switches between the sword and the axe! User friendly. As a parent of active boys I prefer the plastic construction for its durability, but I love the addition of the foam along the edges to protect things that may come in contact with. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: Hdane

customer_reviews.title: Not for older kids. Good looking
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have expected it to tear...being it's foam material..but I did hope it to be a bit stronger. For the price..I do not recommend it, unless its for maybe a 5 yr old or younger child. I got it for my 10 yr.old grandson...he was a bit too rough with it. However, it is good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Hermelinda Banuelos

customer_reviews.title: NOT the same item, and Its USED
customer_reviews.text: This item was not the same color as the one advertised in the picture at all, it is not New As described it was used. See the pictures and do not buy this item if you are expecting the one advertised.
customer_reviews.author: X-Man

customer_reviews.title: My son was ECSTATIC!
customer_reviews.text: So excited, jumping for joy, all that. and the excitement hasn't dimmed. He still plays with it even days after Christmas, and wants to bring it with him everywhere! The toy easily transitions between a sword and a pickax, its rather neat! Wish I had one when i was little ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sons 9th birthday. He is obsessed with anything Minecraft right now. Upon opening it he loved it. He was soon running around the house pretending to fight off zombies and dig up diamonds. It only lasted about a week before he was bored of it and returned to using a foam sword. He complained it was too heavy to play with. Overall it was a great item. It's just too bad they couldn't make it any lighter for actual play.
customer_reviews.author: Adrena

customer_reviews.title: Quality toy for any minecraft fan.
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed by quality of item, especially after reading other reviews. It turns easily from a pick are to a sword with a quick pull of the hilt. A pull the other way on the blade converts it back to a pick axe. My kids role play for hours with this toy. It is a hard thick plastic so parental supervision is encouraged. Does not work well at minning stone, but will crack a TV with a simple blow.
customer_reviews.author: BBbandura

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long.....
customer_reviews.text: Bought early for my 4 year old grandson - opened for Christmas Eve and within an hour it was broken!! On one side the pickax part would not come out and the other side it would not go back in. Crap toy for $30
customer_reviews.author: scrubs

customer_reviews.title: Niece’s birthday gift had scratches
customer_reviews.text: Since she’s 7y/o and super excited about anything Minecraft my sister did not want to take it from her to get a replacement. I was aware from other reviews of the possibility of it coming damaged. My sister said there were large scratches on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tdream

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: My youngest got this for his bday and absolutely loves it! I like that he can transform it into two different toys. Would recommend highly, and I would definitely purchase again. It's very well made, no cheap plastic. Does have some foam so that fingers don't get pinched while transforming.
customer_reviews.author: B L

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this but it is really dangerous. The sword handle pushes in to turn into an axe. It is super easy to pinch your fingers and hands. He has done it several times and it really hurts. The toy is also very hard plastic, not foam. It isn’t for kids. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: A time tested favorite for my 7 year old boy.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year-old has had one for 2.5 years and it still transforms easily and has no chips. I do tell him not to beat on things with it, but he's not careful. I would definitely buy again! He still loves it! He destroyed an all foam one quickly.
customer_reviews.author: gingerwasabi

customer_reviews.title: Two tools in one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. He loves it. It does not seem to have much play value in it because it’s hard plastic so you can’t really swing it around or hit things with it. The fact that it is two tools in one is neat though. Overall, I think it is a great toy for anyone who loves Minecraft.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the mindcrafter
customer_reviews.text: Grandson was excited when he got it for Christmas. Good Craftsman ship. Not flimsy at all
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Waisley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, durable and safe.
customer_reviews.text: My five year old’s favorite Minecraft toy. He loves the fact that it transforms from a pickaxe to a sword! Very well made hard plastic with cushions on the edge of the blade and tips of the pickaxe for a safe and fun play time! I also got the bow and arrow! Superb!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Cool Toy for the Kid that likes Minecraft
customer_reviews.text: My son was very happy on Christmas day. He loves this toy. It appears to be durable and it converts easily from sword to pickax. A little pricey for this toy in my opinion, but I am happy that my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: CBornstein

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Damaged product packaging, product also arrived with scratches. After an hour of my son playing with it both sides of the toy already have the paint/decorations coming off. Oh well, doesn’t seem to affect how much he enojoys playing with it, I just wish it had arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: MrsBailey

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: This gets tons of playtime at my house! I was worried it would have trouble transforming after being played with a bit rough, but so far everything is still working great! This is used for sword fights and "mining" all the time. It looks great and works great!
customer_reviews.author: NovelMomma

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun to play with!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son loved this! He's had this for almost half a year now, plays with it all the time along with his Nerf gun and I'm quite shocked that it's still in one piece [although pretty banged up]. Construction is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: xhunt

customer_reviews.title: Transforms easily, fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son, who loves Minecraft. He loves it! It arrived in a box of its own. It’s very easy to convert from axe to sword. One side is diamond shapes and the other side mimics wood. Fun toy!
customer_reviews.author: qiaoAMZfinds

customer_reviews.title: My 8 Year Olds favorite Toy
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old was overjoyed to receive this toy. He loves Minecraft and couldn't believe he now has the axe and sword all in one toy! It has been more sturdy than I expected and holds up to even outdoor play.
customer_reviews.author: JLHM

customer_reviews.title: Hard to wield due to the handle shape and product weight.
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult to wield because the handle is rigid and the product weighs a lot. It's not the most practical toy for a small child who likes minecraft. I think it is a cool collectible though, and I like the product's overall ingenuity.
customer_reviews.author: Reid Kirschman

customer_reviews.title: thank goodness for the hard rubber material at impact points
customer_reviews.text: was worried about hard plastic impacts on extremities, walls, furniture etc. the rubber inserts are well thought out and we haven't needed a bandaid or furniture scratch remover yet
customer_reviews.author: D. Steelquist

customer_reviews.title: A bit hit with my 9-year-old
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for this for his 9th birthday. He really likes it and how it transforms. The transformation is smooth and works well. It is a bit heavier than I expected, but this doesn't seem to bother my son, who swings it around with his friends.He loves it! It is hard plastic and feels very solid.
customer_reviews.author: Warrior Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very durable toy for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This minecraft transforming sword is pretty neat! Its very durable and transforms from a sword to a pick axe very easily! I got this for my nephew for Christmas and he was thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Albert Cropek

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS GREAT! my now 10 year old was stoked to see this on his birthday! The fact that it morphs was one of the things he loved best! It is really a great buy because you get two toys for the price of one!! I would highly recommend for the minecraft lover in your life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy to transform
customer_reviews.text: My nephews love these. They are very durable, and it's very easy to transform them from one form to another. There were definitely some tears when fingers were hit while the kids dueled each other after first getting the swords, but it taught them not to hit each other.
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's 9th birthday and it is a huge hit! It is easy for him to put between pickaxe and sword, and there are some soft edges so he can bang it around and not hurt anything. He has been playing with it nonstop since I gave it to him, and even keeps it with him in bed at night! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: stephmowery

customer_reviews.title: These were a great find for my two sons
customer_reviews.text: These were a great find for my two sons. They are high quality plastic, transition easily between sword and pickaxe and even have foam edges that come out of the sides to keep them from hitting each other with the hard plastic. I highly recommend these for any Minecraft lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Reece Family

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like most toys for kids these days. Was only interested for a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: M. Paschall

customer_reviews.title: I underestimated his excitement!
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for his 6th birthday and I knew he would like it, but I didn't know just how much! It's easy to use and he carries it everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Gails98

customer_reviews.title: Transforms well
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my 6 year old son, he loves it! I paid about $35 for it before Christmas and I think I’ve seen the price up to $100! BTW it’s not $100 cool, it’s $35 cool.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and returning!!
customer_reviews.text: Sections of item painted poorly - paint does not even match. It's obvious that it was already used or damaged. This is going right back!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: and my son is having a great time playing with it
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I had with this is that the inside is foam, but other than that it's very solid, and my son is having a great time playing with it. The only reason I don't like the foam is because our cat likes to chew on foam materials (like crock shoes, yoga mats, etc... and binkies - SO really no issue with the sword, just the cat)
customer_reviews.author: Tabble.Dabble

customer_reviews.title: Ouch.... Mom he hit me!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these and they are so fun for the kids to play with. The sword edges are foam that retracts to make the pick. The foam makes playful blows not hurt as bad 🤣 They seem pretty durable other than the paint gets scratched kinda easy.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is made well and is good quality. It is made of heavier sturdier plastic, which I expect means that it will last longer. However there had to be a no fighting rule with this particular sword in my house for that same reason, which is perfectly fine. My kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for one of his birthday gifts and he absolutely loves it! It is easy to transform from the pick ax to the sword and it has lasted my rough boy almost a year now! I would highly recommend this like that it is a hard plastic and not the foam
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids who like Minecraft
customer_reviews.text: Like most minecraft toys, overpriced. But, this one at least turns into two different items. It's well made, as well. If you find it ever on sale, definitely worth the money for any Minecraft fan.
customer_reviews.author: kristenS

customer_reviews.title: it easily transforms from sword
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 yo for his Halloween costume as Steve from Minecraft. He loves this thing. it easily transforms from sword, to pickaxe and back. Soft foam edges, but base is made of quality plastic. Has not broken and we have had for a couple months now. It takes a beating from my son, he loves to swing it and throw it haha
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really cool!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is SO cool! My six year old loves it. It’s super easy to transform which is a huge plus because he can do it on his own.
customer_reviews.author: OhHi

customer_reviews.title: Got for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: He says he likes it a lot if hes happy that's all that I care about and it is a cool looking toy. 100% recommended
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Quack

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, and great to have sword and pickaxe in one!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for his Halloween costume so he didnt have to choose between a sword or pickaxe, and of course we had to get it out and try it. We haven't had it long but it seems very sturdy, and transforming it from one to the other is very easy. Like others said it has foam but mostly is hard plastic so you'll just have to watch enthusiastic kids to make sure they don't go ham.
customer_reviews.author: Cally Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Fun all in one toy!
customer_reviews.text: Cool toy for the kid who loves minecraft. Easy to use and transfer from sword to pickaxe. Not too big or too small. And not heavy. Fun for hours of imaginative play.
customer_reviews.author: PRSoldier

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what it said it is and does exactly what it’s supposed to do, transform between sword and pickaxe
customer_reviews.author: MiguelDelgado

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son loves Minecraft, so he was so excited to finally receive this! It’s big and heavy so I just be careful when/if your kids are swinging it. Otherwise, it’s good!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My kid LOVES this toy. He was very excited to open it and I am excited it has a foam edge so that way when he is fighting "bad guys " he doesn't wreck my furniture. A great toy!
customer_reviews.author: jrconn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great toy
customer_reviews.text: When I was buying it I thought my son would just put it aside after a few minutes. But I see him playing with this toy more converting it to axe or sword periodically.
customer_reviews.author: Bakyt Niyazov

customer_reviews.title: Great Present
customer_reviews.text: I dominated my nephews birthday with this gift. He LOVED it. The adults argued over it wanting a turn.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Zaragoza

customer_reviews.title: 9 yr old dreams
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr old LOVES! Everyday he plays with this toy. He even smacked a tree and it only caused a slight dent in the foam part of sword. He learned not to do that but it showed durability.
customer_reviews.author: alley me

customer_reviews.title: My boy loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My kids really love any and all things minecraft. I got this transforming sword and pickaxe for my 7 year old boy. He loves it. Seems quite sturdy. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: A.T.

customer_reviews.title: Still in tip top shape!
customer_reviews.text: After over a year of being thrown, dropped, banged on walls and tables... Still looks pretty good. Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves this.
customer_reviews.text: It was his favorite birthday present. And he hasnt stopped playing with it. Perfect gift for a kid who loves Minecraft.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chevez

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kid into Minecraft
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday gift for 8 year old boy, highly coveted by all his friends at the party
customer_reviews.author: Hijack Katanga

customer_reviews.title: He loved it. He's 8 and found it easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Grandson for Christmas! He loved it. He's 8 and found it easy to change it from one to the other. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for an 9 year old and it was a hit with all the kids. They loved the convert between sword and axe.
customer_reviews.author: remat

customer_reviews.title: Great quality toy
customer_reviews.text: I initially thought this was ridiculously expensive until I got it. It's a quality toy! Plus I tend to buy Costco cakes and decorate them with a toy, and this was absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: AntOB

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids
customer_reviews.text: It is a very hard plastic. Hurts when you get hit with it. 😂 but whennyou buy for a kid and they are sword fighting. There will be injuries. Be ok if you are buying to just sit on a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: it's awesome, but be aware it is hard plastic with ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 5 year old son for his birthday. He loves it, it's awesome, but be aware it is hard plastic with a little bit of foam that works nada if you have a kid that loves to whack stuff and/or you.
customer_reviews.author: A Lewis

customer_reviews.title: My kid plays with this thing everyday!
customer_reviews.text: It's very durable and of great quality! My kid plays with this sword everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremyam

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and so familiar to our boy thru playing minecraft
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a hit this was for the 9 year grandson's brithday. So versitile, well made, sturdy and so familiar to our boy thru playing minecraft. It also was used to hit a pinata for the party.
customer_reviews.author: kit

customer_reviews.title: A diamond sword and axe in your inventory!
customer_reviews.text: This is a toy with an excellent cool factor. A sure hit with any Minecraft fan. Any points or edges meant to simulate a sharp edge are durable foam and the ace tips are spring loaded. This means a mitigated risk of damage to furniture, playmates and the toy itself. Intelligently designed, this is an interesting find, well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My son cashed in his piggy bank for this and he loves it. Seems sturdy and it’s lasted well thus far for him.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: My son has a lot of fun with this
customer_reviews.text: My son was soooo excited to open this up for christmas. He said it was his favorite toy. He loves to pretend to be Steve and runs around trying to mine everything lol. This was a great buy, I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fandom_Girl

customer_reviews.title: Yay
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons Halloween costume. He loved that he could pick between the sword and axe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My child's favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: My kid won't put this down can get pretty rough with it so the durability has really impressed me. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The material and paid is of good quality. It's exactly how I hoped it to be.
customer_reviews.author: JavaInMyCup

customer_reviews.title: ... got this for his birthday and he screamed with joy when he opened it
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old got this for his birthday and he screamed with joy when he opened it. He was uber excited. Just hope he doesn't decide to battle the dog with it. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Kelly and Steve

customer_reviews.title: Worth it :)
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves it and we feel it was worth the money. Feel very sturdy. When in axe setting it has a sturdy foam point (less of a worry about damaging furniture) and the same with the sword.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Popular and harmless Minecraft roleplayiing
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year-old grandson loves all things Minecraft so this was perfect for him for Christmas. The blade part of the sword is harmless and when it retracts, the sword transforms into the pickaxe (you know how boys are with transforming things!). I gave it four stars because he's had it for only a month and I'm not sure how durable it will be. Fingers crossed that it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: Transforms real easy, just pull and push!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son really liked this pick axe, it’s really good quality, hard plastic, very resistant!!!
customer_reviews.author: yeadicam

customer_reviews.title: The kids love these sturdy foam material swords
customer_reviews.text: The kids love these sturdy foam material swords. Bought for Christmas and they were a very good price with free shipping. Arrived very quickly. another retailer was trying to add for shipping to arrive in time for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: ccc

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: It is really cool and very easy to transform. It arrived with scratches all over the end. It doesn't effect the product, just looks used.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Fun convertible toy
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this pick/sword! Sturdy plastic exterior and pop out fin on blade and pick tip are firm but soft. Kids play with it daily.
customer_reviews.author: outdoorMTfunman

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. My kids both have one and play them all the time. It is sturdy and switches from a pick axe to a diamond sword with one easy motion. Great for Minecraft fans.
customer_reviews.author: SMRTME1979

customer_reviews.title: Great price & quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons birthday & he loved it! Haven’t seen this one in stores yet. It is made with good material and easy to transition from sword to pick axe! We bought a second one for a cousins birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Durable and a big hit with our Minecraft loving 5 yo boy. He plays with it all the time and our 7 yo neighbor loves it too. Durable plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Heise

customer_reviews.title: Must have for every Minecraft fan
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful idea! Pick axe and sword in one, diamond on too! Can’t go wrong..
customer_reviews.author: Majky

customer_reviews.title: Very happy 9 year old.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in love with this thing. When she got it she thought it was just a pickaxe but then she realizes it turns into a sword too. and that was a bonus. Definitely worth the money. Very durable hard plastic.

customer_reviews.title: minecraft comes to life

customer_reviews.title: Fun, durable toy my son loves!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my minecraft obsessed son and he absolutely loves it! It came on time and with no defects or marks. He's had it for over a week and even with all the wear and tear and chaos of a 8 year old it's holding up great

customer_reviews.title: Great quality toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He already had the transforming regular sword & pickaxe, and he had to have this diamond one also. Great quality toy.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Minecraft enthusiats
customer_reviews.text: Cool minecraft themed item that converts very easily from pick-axe to sword with a quick pull. It is plastic and well made for the cost. Perfect for any minecraft enthusiast.

product_meta.title: Minecraft Transforming Sword/Pickaxe
product_meta.description:
Now you'll be fully equipped to battle Creepers and dig for resources with this dual-action toy! First you're mining with a Diamond Pickaxe, and then with one smooth motion you're prepared for attack, holding a Diamond Sword! As members of the Minecraft community know, a pickaxe is one of the most utilized tools in Minecraft. They also know the importance of swords, especially diamond swords, which offer the most uses and can do the most damage. Exciting two-in-one tool has brilliant new diamond design, and of course diamonds are very rare in Minecraft, so this is a thrilling device! Large-scale toy feels truly substantial in your hands and makes a magical, seamless transformation from tool to sword and back again.

BRAND STORY
By Mattel
feature_bullets: ​ Dynamic tool transforms from pickaxe to sword with one swift motion.
​ Mine for ore - then fight mobs - then go back to mining!
Exciting two-in-one tool has brilliant new diamond design!
​ Pickaxe/Sword is large and feels great in your hands!
​ Be prepared for anything with this great two-in-one, multi-function item inspired by the World of Minecraft.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
